bibl.title: Fourth-Century Monasticism in the Papyri.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology
bibl.author: Judge, Edwin A.

bibl.note: The purpose of this survey is to illustrate the questions that are raised by a systematic review of the documentary papyri bearing on the history of Christianity in Egypt. At Macquarie University the School of History has undertaken to prepare a corpus of such material.
bibl.seg: Judge Edwin A., Fourth-Century Monasticism in the Papyri.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology (Chico, 1981) pp. 613-620.
